summary.span: 為所有 項目提供基底類別。

span.span: Provides a base class for all elements.

summary.span: 使用 項目來定位及排列 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 應用程式中的子物件。

span.span: Use elements to position and arrange child objects in Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A包含的集合中的物件屬性。A contains a collection of objects, which are in the property. 加入子系隱含地將它加入至如項目。Adding a child to a implicitly adds it to the for the element. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 提供一套完整的衍生實作中，啟用許多複雜的配置。 provides a comprehensive suite of derived implementations, enabling many complex layouts. 如果您想要實作新的版面配置容器，使用和方法。If you want to implement new layout containers, use the and methods. 如需示範如何使用這些方法，請參閱[建立自訂內容換行面板範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159979)。For a demonstration of how to use these methods, see [Create a Custom Content-Wrapping Panel Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159979). 項目不會接收滑鼠或手寫筆事件如果未定義。 elements do not receive mouse or stylus events if a is not defined. 如果您需要控制代碼滑鼠或手寫筆事件，但不是想要的背景您，使用。If you need to handle mouse or stylus events but do not want a background for your , use . 面板項目不會接收焦點的預設值。Panel elements do not receive focus by default. 若要強迫要接收焦點的控制台項目，設定屬性`true`。To compel a panel element to receive focus, set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來加入兩個物件加入至。The following example shows how to use the property to add two objects to a . [!code-xaml[StackPanel_snip#StackPanelExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StackPanel_snip/CS/StackPanelExample.xaml#stackpanelexamplewholepage)] [!code-csharp[Stackpanel_Procedural_snip#StackPanelExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Stackpanel_Procedural_snip/CSharp/StackpanelExample.cs#stackpanelexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[Stackpanel_Procedural_snip#StackPanelExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Stackpanel_Procedural_snip/visualbasic/stackpanelexample.vb#stackpanelexamplewholepage)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您無法將資料繫結至這個屬性。You cannot bind data to this property. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例會使用建立水平。The following example uses a to create a horizontal . 水平內所指定。The horizontal is specified within the . 屬性設定為`true`上，這表示，產生的項目應該放在 [面板]。The property is set to `true` on the , which indicates that the generated items should be placed in the panel. 如此一來，指定當無法取代控制項的使用者，而不使用。When you specify it this way, the cannot be replaced by the user of the control without using a . 因此，如果此作業只有您知道您不想要被取代，而不使用範本的面板。Therefore, do this only if you know that you do not want the panel to be replaced without the use of a template. [!code-xaml[StylingIntroSnippet#ListBoxCT](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylingIntroSnippet/CS/window1.xaml#listboxct)] 或者，您可以設定屬性。Alternatively, you can set the property. 下列範例會設定中的。The following example sets the in a of a . span.span: The element on which to apply the property value.

param.name: value
param.span: 這個項目在 Z 平面上出現的順序。

span.span: The order on the z-plane in which this element appears.

summary.span: 設定所指定項目的 附加屬性值。

span.span: Sets the value of the attached property for a given element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 較大`value`的給定`element`、 越有可能`element`是顯示在前景。The greater the `value` of a given `element`, the more likely the `element` is to appear in the foreground. 同樣地，如果`element`具有相對較低`value`、`element`可能會在背景中看起來。Likewise, if an `element` has a relatively low `value`, the `element` will likely appear in the background. 例如，`element`具有`value`為 5 會出現上述`element`具有`value`為 4，接著會出現上述`element`值為 3，依此類推。For example, an `element` that has a `value` of 5 will appear above an `element` that has a `value` of 4, which in turn will appear above an `element` that has a value of 3, and so on. 允許負數值，以及他們繼續此優先順序模式。Negative values are allowed, and they continue this precedence pattern. 成員具有相等的集合值以視覺化樹狀結構中的出現的順序轉譯。Members of a collection that have equal values are rendered in the order in which they appear in the visual tree. 您可以逐一查看的成員，以判斷子系的索引位置集合。You can determine the index position of a child by iterating the members of the collection. ## Examples 下列範例程式碼中會示範如何設定的值屬性 (使用方法)。The following example demonstrates in code how to set the value of the property (by using the method). [!code-cpp[canvasz-order#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CanvasZ-Order/CPP/CanvasZ-Order.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[canvasz-order#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CanvasZ-Order/Csharp/CanvasZ-Order.cs#2)] [!code-vb[canvasz-order#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CanvasZ-Order/VisualBasic/CanvasZ-Order.vb#2)]
